meanings.definition: The amount of content that fits on a computer or phone screen.
meanings.sent1: I scrolled through screenfuls of text to find the information I needed.
meanings.sent2: The website displayed screenfuls of images and articles for me to explore.
meanings.sent3: After hours of browsing, I found myself lost in a sea of screenfuls of data.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a library, filled with screenfuls of knowledge waiting to be accessed.
meanings.sent5: The screenfuls of emails in my inbox seemed never-ending, like a digital avalanche.

meanings.definition: A visual display of information on a screen.
meanings.sent1: The presentation was filled with colorful screenfuls of graphs and charts.
meanings.sent2: The movie theater screen showed screenfuls of action-packed scenes.
meanings.sent3: The screenfuls of notifications kept popping up, like eager puppies seeking attention.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were glued to the screenfuls of breaking news, unable to look away.
meanings.sent5: The screenfuls of data on the monitor danced like digital fireflies, mesmerizing the viewers.
